DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to validate a feasible, safe and reliable iohexol plasma clearance method in routine monitoring of the renal function (GFR) in children. Different parameters of renal function will be compared to the gold standard multiple sample points procedure of iohexol clearance.
DOC.criteria: Age < 18 years Clinical indication for measurement of glomerular filtration rate Previous serious reaction on Iohexol
DOC.keyword: Measurement of kidney function in children
